scripts.build: pnpm --filter @mfe/shared run build && pnpm --filter './mfe-*' run build
scripts.dev: pnpm --filter @mfe/shared run build && concurrently -k -n registry,api,shell -c cyan,red,blue "pnpm --filter registry run dev" "pnpm --filter api-todo run dev" "pnpm --filter shell run dev"
scripts.setup: pnpm run build && pnpm run publish:mfes
scripts.start: pnpm run setup && pnpm run dev
